name: Healthy Salmon Burger
author: Good Food Team, BBC Goodfood
ingredients: 4 (~600g) boneless skinless salmon fillets, cut into chunks
1 tsp avocado oil (or use cooking spray)
method: Tip the salmon into a food processor with the paste, ginger, soy and chopped coriander. Pulse until roughly minced. Tip out the mix and shape into 4 burgers. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan, then fry the burgers for 4-5 mins on each side, turning until crisp and cooked through.
